text: Anders Frøen, professionally known as Mood Melodies, is a Norwegian record producer and songwriter. He has produced and written songs for Zedd, Jessie J, Alan Walker, Brandy and Karmin. ==Career== Mood Melodies got his big international break when Alan Walker's "Faded" became an international hit in 2016, with more than 2 billion YouTube views to date. He signed to Stargate and Sony/ATV's joint venture publishing company Stellar Songs in 2016. ==Songwriting and production credits== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
